org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell

Class Display.AvroFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.Display.AvroFileInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    Display

    protected static class Display.AvroFileInputStream
extends InputStream
    This class transforms a binary Avro data file into an InputStream with data that is in a human readable JSON format.
